Title: Graham Chronofighter Oversize Superlight Carbon Watch 2CCBK.B11A.K95K
Description: Watches Jewelry Accessories About us Policies Graham Chronofighter Oversize Superlight Carbon Watch 2CCBK.B11A.K95K (Click to Enlarge) Graham Chronofighter Oversize Superlight Carbon Watch 2CCBK.B11A.K95K Condition: Unworn Brand: Graham Series: Chronofighter Oversize Retail Price: $11,550.00 Reference: 2CCBK.B11A.K95K Also Known As: 2CCBKB11AK95K Web ID: 150526 Stock Number: 2188694-M Case Size: 47 mm Gender: Gents Movement: Automatic Caliber: G1747 Bezel: Carbon Functions: Hours, Minutes, Seconds, Small seconds, Date, Chronograph, Tachymeter Strap: Rubber Clasp Type: Tang Signatures: Graham Power Reserve: 48 Hours Materials: Carbon Finishing: Carbon Case Back: Transparent (See-Through) Dial Color: Black Weighing less than 100 grams, this offbeat watch deserves its Super light label. Made for the notable Chronofighter Oversize collection by Graham, this timepiece features a splendid 47 mm super light black carbon nanotube composite case with smoked sapphire crystal case back. The black carbon dial features hours, minutes and seconds, 30-minute counter at six o’clock, small seconds sub-dial at three o’clock, tachymeter scale with white graduation and a date window at eight o’clock. The dial is protected with reliable domed sapphire crystal with anti-reflective coating on both faces. The super light case hides the magnificent G1747 caliber, beating at 28,800 VpH, including 25 jewels and Incabloc shock absorber for greater accuracy. The red rubber strap is embellished with “Clous de Paris” pattern, and combined with black carbon tang clasp. The watch is water resistant to 100 meters and has 48-hours power reserve. Please note that some watches are on memo from other dealers and do not carry a return policy, you will be notified before your purchase if the selected watch meets this criteria.
